data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Akron have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Guadalajara.
Free kick Guadalajara.
Guadalajara pushes forward through Jose Macias, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 2, Jorge Perez blows against Guadalajara's Cristian Calderon for offside.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Guadalajara are coming forward and Isaac Brizuela gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Jorge Perez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Puebla's half.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 14, Guadalajara drive upfield and Isaac Brizuela gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Puebla defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
Puebla's Bernardo Cuesta breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 26, Guadalajara's Jose Macias gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jorge Perez awards Puebla a goal kick.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 28, Jorge Perez signals a Puebla throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 29, Jorge Perez awards Puebla a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Zapopan Puebla attack through Bernardo Cuesta. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Puebla.
Gilberto Sepulveda Lopez (Guadalajara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 33, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Akron.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Puebla in the half of Guadalajara.
Alan Torres (Guadalajara) is red-carded and dismissed.
Attention is being given to Pueblaâ€™s Omar Fernandez and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Luis Fernando Tena is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Akron with Dieter Villalpando replacing Sebastian Martinez.
Puebla's Omar Fernandez is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Salvador Reyes is booked for the away team.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Akron.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Puebla.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Zapopan Guadalajara attack through Isaac Brizuela. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
Pablo Gonzalez Diaz for Puebla drives towards goal at Estadio Akron. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The first-half has come to a close in Zapopan.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
The away team have replaced Salvador Reyes with Daniel Alvarez. This is the first substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
The away team replace Bernardo Cuesta with Osvaldo Martinez.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Jorge Perez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Puebla's half.
In the minute 49, Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Jose Macias for Guadalajara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 54, Puebla drives forward and Omar Fernandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 55, Daniel Alvarez of Puebla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Brayan Angulo is replacing George Corral for the away team.
Guadalajara are pushing forward but Uriel Antuna's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Jose Macias (Guadalajara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 59, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Isaac Brizuela gets his shot on target but fails to score for Guadalajara.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Puebla's Santiago Ormeno gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guadalajara defender.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 63, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Santiago Ormeno.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Jesus Sanchez breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 67, Jorge Perez awards Puebla a goal kick.
Jose Macias (Guadalajara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
In the minute 72, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Jesus Angulo is replacing Isaac Brizuela for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Luis Fernando Tena (Guadalajara) is making a third substitution, with Ronaldo Cisneros replacing Jose Macias.
In the minute 73, Throw-in high up the field for Guadalajara in Zapopan.
Puebla are coming forward and Brayan Angulo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 75, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Juan Reynoso is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Akron with Amaury Escoto replacing Santiago Ormeno.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 81, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara's Jesus Angulo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Akron. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Miguel Ponce is replacing Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Puebla.
In Zapopan Puebla drive forward through Amaury Escoto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 88, In Zapopan, Omar Fernandez of Puebla is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 89, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Puebla.
Puebla's Brayan Angulo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Puebla's Daniel Alvarez breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
